translation.en: Who's there?
Who's there?
Help!
What do you want?
Some say the world will end in fire
translation.es: El mundo acabará, dicen, presa del fuego

translation.en: Some say in ice
translation.es: Otros afirman que vencerá el hielo

translation.en: From what I've tasted of desire I hold with those who favor fire
translation.es: Por lo que yo sé  Doy la razón a los que hablan de fuego

translation.en: But if I had to perish twice
translation.es: Mas si tuviera que sucumbir dos veces

translation.en: I think I know enough of hate
translation.es: Pienso que sé bastante sobre el odio

translation.en: To say that for destruction ice
translation.es: Para afirmar que, para destrucción, el hielo

translation.en: Is also great
And would suffice
You know, I've got an English final.
I gotta focus.
Marry me.
No.
Marry me.
Change me.
Okay, I will if you marry me.
translation.es: Lo haré si te casas conmigo.

translation.en: It's called a compromise.
Let's just call it coercion.
It's not fair.
Marriage is just...
It's a piece of paper.
Where I'm from, it's the way one says, I love you.
translation.es: De donde yo vengo, es como uno dice te amo.

translation.en: Well, where I come from, at my age,
translation.es: De donde yo vengo, a mi edad,

translation.en: it's the way one says, I just got knocked up.
translation.es: es como una dice estoy embarazada.

translation.en: So, you're worried about what people will think?
translation.es: ¿Te preocupa lo que piense la gente?

translation.en: You know, two out of three marriages end in divorce.
translation.es: Dos de cada tres matrimonios terminan en divorcio.

translation.en: Well, I think you'll find the vampire/human divorce rate
translation.es: Descubrirás que el índice de divorcio vampiros/humanos

translation.en: is a little lower.
So marry me.
I can't.
I have to be back at 4:00.
Four o'clock on the dot.
That kid trying to brown- nose me now or something?
He has a name. Now he's too punctual for you?
Okay.
You understand why you're being punished, right?
I know, I put you through hell.
Yes, you did.
But I have other reasons for grounding you.
translation.es: Pero tengo otras razones para castigarte.

translation.en: Like, uh...
I just want you to get some separation from him.
translation.es: Quiero que te separes un poco de él.

translation.en: Dad, there's nothing you can say.
translation.es: Papá, no hay nada que puedas decir.

translation.en: Edward is in my life.
translation.es: Edward es parte de mi vida.

translation.en: Yeah, I'm gathering that.
So, all right, how about this?
I'll make you a deal.
You're not grounded anymore
if you use your new- found freedom to see some of your other friends, too, like...
translation.es: si utilizas tu libertad para ver a tus viejos amigos, como...

translation.en: Like Jacob.
He's going through a really tough time right now.
translation.es: Está pasando por un mal momento.

translation.en: His dad's really worried about him.
I remember when that was you.
translation.es: Recuerdo cuando tú pasaste por ésas.

translation.en: You needed a friend.
Jake was there.
Hey, it's Jake. Leave a message.
Jacob hadn't talked to me in weeks.
translation.es: Hacía semanas que Jake no me hablaba.

translation.en: I wanted to fix it, he just... He wouldn't give me the chance.
translation.es: Quería solucionar lo nuestro,  pero no me daba la oportunidad.

translation.en: If just for tonight, darling Let's get lost
translation.es: TE EXTRAÑO. MUCHO. NO CAMBIA NADA. LO SIENTO. JACOB

translation.en: You scared me.
You're going down to the reservation.
How did you...
Alice.
Hey, did you do this to my truck?
Bella, you have to understand.
- Your safety is everything to me. -
translation.es: Tu seguridad lo es todo para mí.

translation.en: Jacob's not gonna hurt me.
Not intentionally, but the wolves have no control.
translation.es: No intencionalmente, pero los lobos no pueden controlarse.

translation.en: Edward.
I have until graduation to see him.
translation.es: Tengo hasta mi graduación para verlo.

translation.en: And then I'll be one of you,
and he'll hate me forever.
Well, I'm sorry.
- No way. Stop. - Throw it away.
- Good. Just in time. - Hey.
All right, check it out. All right. Let's see, we got.
- My fellow students. Right? - Good.
- Cute. - Right? We are the future.
Anything is possible, if you just believe.
translation.es: Todo es posible, si así lo creen.

translation.en: - Nice. - Blah, blah, blah.
- Perfect. - And you got yourself a speech.
No, this'll be my speech when I want everyone to throw diplomas at my head.
translation.es: Será mi discurso cuando quiera que me arrojen cosas.

translation.en: So, thank you.
You gotta embrace the cliches, Jess.
translation.es: Tienes que aceptar los clichés, Jess.

translation.en: They are the bread and butter of all valedictorians.
translation.es: Son el pan y la sal de los graduados.

translation.en: Hmm. And that is why you are not valedictorian.
translation.es: Y por eso no te graduaste.

translation.en: Jess doesn't need cliches.
The speech is gonna be epic.
Epic? It'll change lives.
I've decided to throw a party.
After all, how many times are we gonna graduate high school?
translation.es: Después de todo, ¿cuántas veces vamos a graduarnos?

translation.en: A party? At your place?
I've never seen your house.
No one's ever seen their house.
Another party, Alice?
It'll be fun.
Yeah. That's what you said last time.
translation.es: Sí, eso dijiste la última vez.

translation.en: - Hey, Angela. - Yeah?
Do you need some help with those?
...be sending money 'cause it's the polite thing to do,
and then you'll be raking it in.  Wait a minute. People give you money?
translation.es: -y tú te llenarás los bolsillos. -Espera. ¿La gente te da dinero?

translation.en: I know you know what she saw. Tell me.
translation.es: Sé que sabes lo que ella vio. Cuéntame.

translation.en: It was nothing.
You looked worried.
Just that everyone noticed how strange Alice is.
translation.es: Es que todos notan que Alice es extraña.

translation.en: I think that ship sailed long ago.
I wonder what's wrong.
Their son went missing in Seattle over a year ago.
translation.es: Su hijo desapareció en Seattle hace un año.

translation.en: Charlie's doing what he can, but...
translation.es: Charlie está haciendo todo lo posible.

translation.en: You know something about this?
We've been tracking the situation in Seattle for a while.
translation.es: Venimos investigando la situación hace rato.

translation.en: Unexplained disappearances. Killings.
If the situation gets any more conspicuous, the Volturi will step in.
translation.es: Si siguen llamando la atención, los Volturi intervendrán.

translation.en: If they go to Seattle, they could come here.
translation.es: Si van a Seattle, podrían venir aquí.

translation.en: They could see I'm still human.
It won't get that far.
But we'll go to Seattle if we have to.
translation.es: Pero, de ser necesario, iremos a Seattle.

translation.en: I'll fax these down, first thing.  Thank you.
- Hey. - Hey.
You ready for dinner? Yeah.
It is still just you and I, right?
No, I'm just dropping her off.
See you later.
Bye.
Bella, my parents wanted to remind you about the airline ticket
translation.es: Bella, mis padres querían recordarte del pasaje

translation.en: you got for your birthday. What airline ticket?
A round trip ticket to see Mom in Florida.
translation.es: Ida y vuelta, para visitar a mamá en Florida.

translation.en: Well... That was generous.
It expires soon, so you might want to use it this weekend.
translation.es: Expira pronto, así que deberías usarlo este fin de semana.

translation.en: Well, I can't just drop everything and go.
translation.es: No puedo largar todo e irme.

translation.en: It might be your last chance to see her before you graduate.
translation.es: Puede que sea tu última oportunidad antes de graduarte.

translation.en: Well, might not be a bad idea.
translation.es: Puede que no sea una mala idea.

translation.en: Get out of town for a couple days. Get some distance.
translation.es: Irte por unos días. Distanciarte un poco.

translation.en: Yeah, I wouldn't mind seeing Mom.
translation.es: No me molestaría ver a mamá.

translation.en: As long as you use the companion ticket.
translation.es: Siempre que tú uses el otro pasaje.

translation.en: Wait. There's two tickets?
Super.
That makes me really happy.
I did want to see my mom.
translation.es: Sí que quería ver a mamá.

translation.en: I wanted to know that her life was full and satisfying.
translation.es: Saber que vivía  una vida plena y gratificante.

translation.en: Aren't you gonna miss this?
Can't you just feel the vitamin D soaking up in your pores?
translation.es: ¿No sientes la vitamina D penetrando  tus poros?

translation.en: Yeah, I am gonna miss this.
You know, colleges in Florida are a lot sunnier.
translation.es: Los colegios en Florida son mucho más soleados.

translation.en: I'm just saying, if you go to the University of Alaska,
translation.es: Sólo comento. Si vas a la Universidad de Alaska,

translation.en: I'm never gonna see you.
They have a really great science program.
translation.es: Tienen un buen programa de ciencia.

translation.en: You mean, Edward program?
The way he watches you,
translation.es: La manera en que te observa.

translation.en: it's like he's willing to leap in front of you and take a bullet or something.
translation.es: Como si estuviera dispuesto a recibir un balazo por ti.

translation.en: Is that a bad thing?
It's an intense thing.
You're different with him.
He moves, you move.
translation.es: Él se mueve, tú te mueves.

translation.en: Like magnets.
I don't know, we're just...
In love. I get it.
I just want to make sure you're making the right choices for you.
translation.es: Quiero asegurarme de que estás tomando las decisiones correctas.

translation.en: You know, 'cause you're the one that's gonna have to live with them.
translation.es: Porque tendrás que vivir con ellas.

translation.en: All right, enough with the heavy.
Mom.
Congraduation.
I didn't want you to spend any of your money.
Ah, I didn't, come on.
- Are these all our old trip T- shirts? - Mmm- hmm.
Get out! I saved them all.
I thought they'd make a good quilt, keep you warm up in Alaska.
translation.es: Pensé que te mantendrían caliente en Alaska.

translation.en: Remember this one? Ensenada.
- The snake pit. - Yeah.
But this one is my favorite, here.
The three- headed lobster from Maine.
translation.es: La Langosta de Tres Cabezas de Maine.

translation.en: This is amazing. Aw. Honey, I'm glad you like it.
translation.es: -Esto es increíble. -Me alegra que te guste.

translation.en: I just figured, you know, when you get older,
have kids, we can add to it.
Maybe go visit the world's largest ketchup bottle or something.
translation.es: Quizá ir a visitar la botella de Ketchup más grande del mundo.

translation.en: - Thanks. - Oh.
I'm glad you like it.
Just thought you should have a little piece of me up there in Alaska.
translation.es: Quería que tuvieras un pedacito de mí en Alaska.

translation.en: - Mom... - Yeah?
I miss you.
Oh, honey, I miss you, too.
Are you sure this is where you saw her?
She's almost here.
On your left!
Wait!
She's in their territory.
She'll get away!
No, she won't!
Emmett, no!
Do you regret going?
No.
It was really great seeing my mom.
translation.es: Fue una alegría ver a mi mamá.

translation.en: Just really hard saying goodbye.
It doesn't have to be goodbye.
Is that why you asked me to go?
You thought I was gonna change my mind?
I'm always hoping for that.
What?
If I asked you to stay in the car, would you?
translation.es: Si te pidiera que te quedaras en el auto, ¿lo harías?

translation.en: Of course not.
Hey.
Charlie said you left town.
Yeah. To visit my mom. Why?
translation.es: Sí, a visitar a mi mamá. ¿Por qué?

translation.en: He's checking to see if you're still human.
translation.es: Quiere confirmar que sigues siendo humana.

translation.en: Look, I'm here to warn you.
If your kind come on our land again...
translation.es: Si tu especie vuelve a entrar a nuestro terreno...

translation.en: Wait, what?
You didn't tell her?
Just leave it alone, Jacob.
Tell me what?
Emmett and Paul had a misunderstanding.
translation.es: Emmett y Paul tuvieron un malentendido.

translation.en: It's nothing to worry about.
Listen to you.
Did you lie to get her out of town, too?
translation.es: ¿También le mentiste para que se fuera?

translation.en: You should just leave.
Now.
She has a right to know.
She is the one the redhead wants.
translation.es: Ella es a quien la pelirroja busca.

translation.en: Victoria?
Alice's vision.
I was trying to protect you.
By lying to me.
Okay, we're gonna talk about this, but...
You.
Why haven't you called me back?
I had nothing to say.
Well, I have tons. Hold on. Hey.
Bella.
Edward, you have to trust me.
translation.es: Edward, tienes que confiar en mí.

translation.en: I do trust you.
It's him I don't trust.
Hey, lose the grin, Jacob. We're just going for a ride.
translation.es: Deja de sonreír, Jacob. Sólo vamos de paseo.

translation.en: Hold on tight.
Are you sure this is a good idea?
I am the vampire girl, remember?
Hey, look who's back!
What up, Bella?
Quil? You, too?
- Yep. Finally made the pack. -
translation.es: Finalmente me uní a la manada.

translation.en: I'm glad you're here, Bella.
Maybe we can get a break from Jake's obsessive inner monologue.
translation.es: Por fin un descanso de los monólogos de Jake.

translation.en: I wish Bella would call.
I wish Bella wouldn't call.
Maybe I should call Bella. Maybe I should call Bella and hang up.
All right, you can shut up now.
Bella, this is Leah Clearwater, Harry's daughter.
translation.es: Bella, ella es Leah Clearwater, la hija de Harry.

translation.en: Hey. I'm really sorry about your father.
If you're here to torture Jacob some more, feel free to leave.
translation.es: Si viniste a torturar a Jacob, puedes marcharte.

translation.en: Fun, isn't she?
- Bella, hi! - Hey.
I was wondering when we'd see your face around here again.
translation.es: Me preguntaba cuándo volveríamos a verte por aquí.

translation.en: Yeah. Same here.
Sam, we good?
We're good. She won't be getting through our line any time soon.
translation.es: Sí. No volverá a penetrar nuestro perímetro.

translation.en: - Cool. - Yeah, that's right boys!
So when did Leah join the pack?
translation.es: ¿Cuándo se unió Leah a la manada?

translation.en: Around when her dad died. Her brother, Seth, also phased.
translation.es: Cuando falleció su padre. Su hermano Seth también se convirtió.

translation.en: He's only 15, one of the youngest we've had.
translation.es: Apenas tiene 15. Uno de los más jóvenes.

translation.en: Sam keeps him home studying, but he's chomping at the bit.
translation.es: Sam lo obliga a quedarse en casa estudiando, pero está ansioso.

translation.en: I wish it was Leah who'd stay home.
translation.es: Ojalá Leah se quedara en su casa.

translation.en: Come on, don't be such a guy.
No, it's not a chick thing.
It's, you know, a triangle thing.
We all have to live the Leah/Sam/Emily pain- fest.
translation.es: Todos tenemos que soportar el dolor del clan Leah/Sam/Emily.

translation.en: Wolf telepathy, remember?
So Sam dumps Leah for Emily?
Yeah, it wasn't like that. Sam hates himself for hurting Leah.
translation.es: No fue así. Sam se detesta a sí mismo por lastimar a Leah.

translation.en: But Emily was the one.
I guess it sort of chooses you sometimes.
translation.es: Sí, a veces te escoge a ti.

translation.en: It's more than some crush, Bella.
Sam imprinted on Emily.
Do I even want to know what that is?
Imprinting on someone is like...
Like when you see her,
everything changes.
All of a sudden, it's not gravity holding you to the planet.
translation.es: No es la gravedad lo que te mantiene aferrado al planeta.

translation.en: It's her.
Nothing else matters.
You would do anything,
be anything for her.
Sounds like you know the feeling.
translation.es: Suena como que conoces el sentimiento.

translation.en: Have you
imprinted on someone?
You'd know if I had.
I just have a direct line to Sam's thoughts.
translation.es: Tengo contacto directo con la mente de Sam.

translation.en: So for now you're...
still you.
And you're still you.
Yeah.
Until graduation.
Graduation?
You knew this was gonna happen.
Not in a month!
I mean, not before you've... You've even lived.
translation.es: No antes de que... Siquiera hubieses vivido.

translation.en: Or before I could...
For a second, just a second, I thought...
But he's got his hooks in you so deep...
translation.es: Pero te tiene en sus garras tan profundamente...

translation.en: I decided this, not him.
Bella, they're not even alive.
It makes me sick.
Better you really be dead than one of them.
translation.es: Mejor que te murieras a ser uno de ellos.

translation.en: I can't believe you said that.
translation.es: No puedo creer que hayas dicho eso.

translation.en: Edward was right, I shouldn't have come.
translation.es: Edward tenía razón, no debí haber venido.

translation.en: Bella, come on. Please.
I'm sorry.
You know, Edward could at least respect meal times.
translation.es: Edward al menos podría respetar la hora de la comida.

translation.en: I was just with Jake.
Good.
I'll just give you two some privacy, then.
translation.es: Les daré un poco de privacidad.

translation.en: Hey. Do you understand how worried I've been?
I was perfectly safe.
I almost broke the treaty to make sure--
translation.es: Casi quebré el tratado para asegurarme.

translation.en: I know I smell like a dog. - I'm sorry. - No, something's wrong.
translation.es: -Lo sé, huelo a perro. -No, algo no está bien.

translation.en: Edward, what's wrong?
Someone's been in here.
Who was it? Someone we know?
This stranger, I didn't recognize his scent.
translation.es: Un desconocido. No reconozco el aroma.

translation.en: A nomad passing through?
A passerby wouldn't have left Bella's father alive.
translation.es: Un transeúnte no hubiese dejado con vida a su padre.

translation.en: The scent disappeared about five miles south of Bella's house.
translation.es: El aroma desapareció a 8 km de la casa de Bella.

translation.en: Someone's orchestrating this.
Victoria?
I would have seen her decide.
Has to be the Volturi.
I don't think it's the Volturi, either.
translation.es: No creo que tampoco sean los Volturi.

translation.en: I've been watching Aro's decisions, too.
translation.es: He visto las decisiones de Aro.

translation.en: So we keep looking.
We'll also take shifts guarding Bella at her house.
translation.es: También nos turnaremos para proteger la casa de Bella.

translation.en: Another protection detail?
Rosalie.
No, she's right.
You can't protect me, watch my dad and search for the intruder.
translation.es: No pueden protegerme, cuidar de mi padre y buscar al intruso.

translation.en: And for Victoria.
And keep yourselves fed.
I'm not leaving you here defenseless.
Well, I'm not gonna let you starve.
translation.es: No permitiré que te prives de comer.

translation.en: And I wouldn't be unprotected. I have...
What?
Whoever it was, he left his stink behind.
translation.es: Quienquiera que haya sido, dejó su hediondez.

translation.en: It'll be hard to miss when we cross it again. We'll handle it from here.
translation.es: Será fácil de notar cuando lo encontremos. Nosotros nos encargamos.

translation.en: We don't need you to handle anything.
translation.es: No necesitamos que se encarguen de nada.

translation.en: Or anyone.
I could care less what you need.
translation.es: No me importa lo que tú necesites.

translation.en: All right, we're done here.
- No, you're done here. - Stop!
I'm tired of this. From now on, I'm Switzerland, okay?
translation.es: Estoy harta de esto. De ahora en más soy Suiza, ¿de acuerdo?

translation.en: Edward hated the idea,
but it wasn't about rivalry anymore.
translation.es: Pero no se trataba de la rivalidad.

translation.en: It was about my safety, and Charlie's.
translation.es: Se trataba de mi seguridad. Y la de Charlie.

translation.en: In the days that followed, I got them to at least try to work together.
translation.es: Intenté que al menos trataran  de trabajar juntos.

translation.en: The wolves took over so the Cullens could hunt.
translation.es: Los lobos nos protegían  para que los Cullen fueran de cacería.

translation.en: It wasn't exactly an easy alliance.
translation.es: No era una alianza sin sus problemas.

translation.en: Doesn't he own a shirt?
I'm good here. You should go.
I'm not gonna be gone long.
Don't rush. You need to hunt.
Maybe rush a little bit.
- Hey, beautiful. - Hi.
So, what do you wanna do today?
Bike, hike, just hang? Your call.
But we're going to a party tonight.
translation.es: Pero luego vamos a una fiesta.

translation.en: Are you sure this is okay?
I really hate being a party crasher.
Technically, you're a council meeting crasher.
translation.es: Técnicamente, arruinarías una reunión del consejo.

translation.en: You see? The council leaders, Dad, Quil's grandpa and Sue Clearwater.
translation.es: ¿Ves? Los líderes, papá, el abuelo de Quil y Sue Clearwater.

translation.en: She took over for Harry when he died.
Okay, I should not be here.
You're okay. I thought...
I mean, they thought it would be good for you to hear the histories.
translation.es: Pensaron que sería bueno que oyeras las historias.

translation.en: The histories?
The tribe's histories? Aren't they secret?
We all got a role to play, and you're part of this.
translation.es: Todos desempeñamos un papel. Tú eres parte de esto.

translation.en: I mean, it's the first time Seth, Leah and Quil'll hear them, too.
translation.es: Seth, Leah y Quil también las oirán por primera vez.

translation.en: But you are the first outsider. Ever.
translation.es: Pero tú eres la primera persona de afuera. La única.

translation.en: If I had known that, I would have, like...
I don't know, dressed better.  Jake!
Hey. It's about time you got here.
Paul's been hoovering the grub, but I saved you some burgers.
translation.es: Paul ha estado devorando todo, pero te guardé unas hamburguesas.

translation.en: Good looking out, bro.
Bella, this is Seth Clearwater, Leah's brother.
translation.es: Bella, él es Seth Clearwater, el hermano de Leah.

translation.en: - Hi. - Newest member of the pack.
Newest. Bestest. Brightest.
translation.es: El más reciente. El mejor. El más inteligente.

translation.en: And slowest.
- Come on, your dad's about to start. - Okay.
translation.es: -Tu padre está a punto de comenzar. -Bien.

translation.en: The Quileutes have been a small tribe from the beginning,
translation.es: Los Quileutes han sido una tribu pequeña desde el comienzo.

translation.en: but we have always had magic in our blood.
translation.es: Pero siempre tuvimos la magia en nuestra sangre.

translation.en: We were great spirit warriors,
shape- shifters that transformed to the powerful wolf.
translation.es: Capaces de transformarnos en el poderoso lobo.

translation.en: This enabled us to scare off our enemies
translation.es: Eso nos permitió ahuyentar a nuestros enemigos.

translation.en: and protect our tribe.
One day, our warriors came across a creature.
translation.es: Un día, nuestros guerreros se toparon con una criatura.

translation.en: It looked like a man,
but it was hard like stone
translation.es: Pero era duro como una piedra.

translation.en: and cold as ice.
Our warriors' sharp teeth finally tore it apart,
translation.es: Los dientes filosos de nuestros guerreros lo hicieron pedazos,

translation.en: but only fire would completely destroy it.
translation.es: pero sólo el fuego era capaz de destruirlos.

translation.en: They lived in fear that the cold man was not alone.
translation.es: Vivían temiendo que el hombre frío no estaba solo.

translation.en: And they were right.
She took her vengeance out on the village.
translation.es: Ella se vengó de la aldea.

translation.en: Our elder chief, Taha Aki,
was the only spirit warrior left to save the tribe after his son was killed.
translation.es: era el único guerrero espiritual capaz de  salvar a la tribu después de morir su hijo.

translation.en: Taha Aki's third wife could see that he would lose.
translation.es: La tercera esposa de Taha Aki sabía  que él perdería.

translation.en: The third wife was no magical being,
translation.es: La tercera esposa no era un ser mágico.

translation.en: no special powers but one...
courage.
The third wife's sacrifice distracted the cold woman
translation.es: El sacrificio de la tercera esposa distrajo a la mujer fría

translation.en: long enough for Taha Aki to destroy her.
translation.es: lo suficiente como para que Taha Aki la destruyera.

translation.en: She saved the tribe.
Over time, our enemies have disappeared.
translation.es: Con el pasar del tiempo, nuestros enemigos han desaparecido.

translation.en: But one remains,
the cold ones.
Our magic awakens when they're near,
translation.es: Nuestra magia despierta cuando se acercan.

translation.en: and we sense it now.
We feel the threat in our blood.
translation.es: Sentimos la amenaza en la sangre.

translation.en: Something terrible is coming,
and we must all be ready,
all of us.
What did you do to me?
I'm so...
Yeah. I know.
We'll find you someone to drink.
translation.es: Encontraremos a alguien a quien beber.

translation.en: Mine!
Just try not to get killed, will you?
translation.es: Pero evita que te maten, ¿de acuerdo?

translation.en: I'm gonna need numbers.
Seattle is in a state of terror.
Police are baffled by the escalating murders and disappearances.
translation.es: La policía está desconcertada  por la cantidad de asesinatos.

translation.en: Theories range from a vicious new gang to a wildly active serial killer.
translation.es: Creen que se trata de una pandilla feroz  o un asesino en serie.

translation.en: Reporting live...
It's getting worse. We're going to have to do something.
translation.es: Está empeorando. Tendremos que hacer algo.

translation.en: It takes more than one of our kind to cause the damage they're reporting.
translation.es: Uno solo de nuestra especie no puede causar tanto daño.

translation.en: Quite a few more. And they're undisciplined, conspicuous.
translation.es: Son unos cuantos. Y no tienen disciplina, llaman la atención.

translation.en: It's newborns.
What, like new vampires?
In the first few months after the change.
translation.es: Los primeros meses después de la transformación.

translation.en: That's when we're at our most uncontrollable. Vicious.
translation.es: Es cuando estamos fuera de control. Feroces.

translation.en: Insane with thirst.
Something to look forward to.
No one's trained these newborns, but this isn't random.
translation.es: Nadie ha entrenado a estos recién nacidos. Pero no es al azar.

translation.en: Someone's creating an army.
Well, now we're definitely going to Seattle.
translation.es: Ahora sí que vamos a Seattle.

translation.en: An army of vampires?
And they've been created to fight someone.
We're the only clan even close to Seattle.
translation.es: Somos el único clan cercano a Seattle.

translation.en: Regardless of why they were made,
translation.es: Ya sea para lo que fueron creados,

translation.en: if we don't put a stop to them, the Volturi will.
translation.es: si no los detenemos, los Volturi sí lo harán.

translation.en: I'm surprised they've let it go on this long.
translation.es: Me sorprende que no hayan actuado antes.

translation.en: Maybe they're behind it.
translation.es: Quizá ellos están detrás de esto.

translation.en: In Italy, I read Aro's mind.
translation.es: En Italia, leí la mente de Aro.

translation.en: He wants me and Alice to join him,
translation.es: Quiere que nos unamos a él.

translation.en: but he knows we'll never choose him as long as our family's still alive.
translation.es: Él sabe que jamás lo haremos mientras nuestra familia viva.

translation.en: An army could solve that for him.
Hey.
Did you eat dinner yet?
Uh, no, I haven't.
This kid, Riley Biers, disappeared over a year ago,
translation.es: El muchacho, Riley Biers, desapareció hace más de un año.

translation.en: and his poor parents have been papering Seattle with these things ever since.
translation.es: Sus pobres padres han empapelado Seattle con esto.

translation.en: You think they should just give up?
Well, I wouldn't if it were you.
translation.es: Yo no lo haría si se tratara de ti.

translation.en: Not ever.
I have to figure out what to tell people.
translation.es: Tengo que decidir qué le diré a la gente.

translation.en: Why I won't be home for Christmases,
translation.es: Por qué no regresaré a casa para Navidad.

translation.en: and why I won't visit,
why they'll never see me again.
translation.es: Por qué jamás volverán a verme.

translation.en: After a few decades, everyone you know will be dead.
translation.es: Después de unas décadas, todos tus conocidos habrán muerto.

translation.en: Problem solved.
Why are you so against me becoming like you?
translation.es: ¿Por qué estás tan en contra de que sea como tú?

translation.en: I've told you.
Be honest with me.
There's more.
I know the consequences of this choice you're making.
translation.es: Sé las consecuencias de esta decisión que estás tomando.

translation.en: I've lived through it.
And to let you suffer that...
You believe I have a soul, and I don't.
translation.es: Tú crees que tengo un alma, y no es así.

translation.en: But to risk yours,
just for the sake of never having to lose you,
that's the most selfish thing I'll ever do.
translation.es: ése es el acto más egoísta que jamás cometeré.

translation.en: I thought that you were afraid that I'd be too different.
translation.es: Pensé que temías a que fuera diferente.

translation.en: You know, like, I wouldn't be warm, and I wouldn't smell the same.
translation.es: Que no sería cariñosa. Y que olería distinto.

translation.en: You'll always be my Bella.
My Bella, just less fragile.
Gosh, it's so pretty here.
So, Alice has planned a big graduation party.
translation.es: Alice ha planeado una gran fiesta de graduación.

translation.en: Which you're invited to.
Yeah, I figured that.
What?
I just wanted to do this differently.
Smoother.
But now I'm out of time.
Do what?
You need to hear the truth, Bella,
understand all your options.
And you need to know
that I'm in love with you,
and I want you to choose me instead of him.
translation.es: Y quiero que me escojas a mí y no a él.

translation.en: I thought you understood.
I don't feel that way for you. I don't buy it.
translation.es: -No siento eso por ti. -No te creo.

translation.en: What don't you buy?
That's how I feel.
You feel something else for me. You just won't admit it.
translation.es: Sientes algo por mí. Pero no quieres admitirlo.

translation.en: So I'm not giving up.
I'm gonna fight for you...
until your heart stops beating.
translation.es: Hasta que tu corazón deje de latir.

translation.en: Well, then you're not gonna have to fight for long.
translation.es: Entonces no tendrás que luchar mucho.

translation.en: You're rushing into it because you're afraid you'll change your mind.
translation.es: Tienes miedo de cambiar de opinión.

translation.en: No, I'm not.
I know what I want.
You wouldn't have to change for me, Bella,
translation.es: No tendrías que cambiar por mí.

translation.en: or say goodbye to anybody.
I can give you more than him.
I mean, he probably can't even kiss you without hurting you.
translation.es: Ni siquiera puede besarte sin lastimarte.

translation.en: Feel that?
Flesh and blood.
And warmth.
God!
God!
Edward!
If you ever touch her against her will again...
translation.es: Si vuelves a tocarla contra su voluntad...

translation.en: Don't do this here! She's not sure what she wants.
- Don't do this here! - Let me give you a clue.
Wait for her to say the words.
translation.es: Espera a que ella te lo pida.

translation.en: Fine! And she will.
Jacob, just go, okay?
Hey, hey, hey! Easy, guys. Easy.
Let's take it down a notch. All right?
What's going on?
I kissed Bella.
And she broke her hand.
translation.es: Y ella se rompió la mano.

translation.en: Punching my face.
Total misunderstanding.
It's just a sprain.
It should heal fairly quickly.
Trying to walk and chew gum at the same time again, Bella?
translation.es: ¿Intentaste caminar y mascar chicle a la misma vez?

translation.en: I punched a werewolf in the face.
Badass. You're gonna be one tough little newborn.
translation.es: Tienes agallas. Serás una recién nacida muy brava.

translation.en: Tough enough to take you on.
translation.es: Lo suficiente como para pelear contigo.

translation.en: Don't worry about it.
Got any leads?
No sign of the intruder. But Victoria continues to make appearances.
translation.es: Ni señal del intruso. Pero Victoria continúa haciendo apariciones.

translation.en: Go blather to someone else about the joys of becoming a newborn.
translation.es: Ve a hablarle a otra sobre la felicidad de convertirte.

translation.en: Okay...
Rosalie,
I don't understand what I did to make you hate me so much.
translation.es: No entiendo qué hice para que me odiaras tanto.

translation.en: Hate...
I don't hate you.
I don't particularly like you, but...
Bella, I envy you.
What?
That's ridiculous. No, it's not.
You have a choice.
I didn't.
None of us did. But you do, and you're choosing wrong.
translation.es: Ninguno de nosotros. Tú sí. Y te estás equivocando.

translation.en: I don't care how miserable your human life is.
translation.es: No me importa cuán miserable sea tu vida humana.

translation.en: My life is not miserable.
I mean, it's not perfect. Nobody's life is perfect.
translation.es: No es perfecta. Nadie tiene una vida perfecta.

translation.en: Mine was.
Absolutely perfect.
There were things I still wanted,
to be married, with a nice house
and a husband to kiss me when he came home,
a family of my own.
Royce King was the most eligible bachelor in town.
translation.es: Royce King era  el caballero más deseado del pueblo.

translation.en: I barely knew him.
But I was young. I was in love with the idea of love.
translation.es: Pero yo era joven y estaba enamorada  del concepto del amor.

translation.en: On the last night of my life, I left a friend's house late.
translation.es: La última noche de mi vida,  salí tarde de la casa de una amiga.

translation.en: I wasn't far from home.
translation.es: No muy lejos de mi casa.

translation.en: There she is.
Hey, Rose!
Come over here! Here. Hold this.
Hey, come over here.
We've been waiting for you.
There she is.
Royce. Royce!
You're drunk.
Isn't she lovely, John? I told you she was a looker.
translation.es: ¿No es hermosa, John? Te dije que era atractiva.

translation.en: It's hard to say with all those clothes on.
translation.es: Es difícil de decir con tanta ropa.

translation.en: What do you say, Rose?
- Why don't we take off a few layers? - Stop it, stop it.
translation.es: -¿Por qué no te quitas unas prendas? -¡Detente!

translation.en: Stop. Stop!
I'll see you tomorrow.
Sober.
Hey, where do you think you're going?
- I said, get-- - Stop! Stop! - Come back. - Get off me!
- Hey. You'll do as I say! - Let go of me! Stop!
Stop! Let go! Stop!
They left me in the street, thinking I was dead.
translation.es: Me dejaron en la calle, dándome por muerta.

translation.en: Believe me, I wanted to be.
Carlisle found me. He smelled all the blood.
translation.es: Carlisle me encontró. Olió la sangre.

translation.en: Thought he was helping me. I'm sorry.
I got my revenge on them.
One at a time.
Saved Royce for last, so he'd know I was coming.
translation.es: Dejé a Royce para el final,  para que supiera que venía por él.

translation.en: I was a little theatrical back then.
translation.es: Era un poco exagerada en ese entonces.

translation.en: Things got better after I found Emmett.
translation.es: Las cosas mejoraron después de conocer a Emmett.

translation.en: But we'll always be this.
Frozen.
Never moving forward.
That's what I miss the most. Possibilities.
translation.es: Eso es lo que más extraño. Posibilidades.

translation.en: Sitting on a front porch somewhere,
translation.es: Sentada al frente de la casa.

translation.en: Emmett, gray- haired, by my side,
surrounded by our grandchildren.
Their laughter.
I understand that that's what you want.
translation.es: Entiendo que eso es lo que tú quieres.

translation.en: But there's nothing I'm ever gonna want more...
translation.es: Pero yo jamás querré nada más

translation.en: than Edward.
You're wrong again.
After you've been changed, there's one thing you'll want more,
translation.es: Después de convertirte, habrá algo que querrás más.

translation.en: one thing you'll kill for.
Blood.
What did I say about a low profile?
Something's coming.
Something bigger than any of us alone.
translation.es: Algo más poderoso que cualquiera de nosotros.

translation.en: And if you can't control yourselves,
translation.es: Y si no son capaces de controlarse,

translation.en: we're all going to die.
What's done is done, just...
clean up after yourselves.
They've already drawn too much attention.
So has our inaction.
Others may begin to question the Volturi's effectiveness.
translation.es: Otros cuestionarán la efectividad de los Volturi.

translation.en: Let them.
Maybe we should consult with Aro.
Aro's decisions are being watched.
We must decide.
Then decide, sister. It's time.
Yes, it is.
Either we let them do what they were created for,
translation.es: O dejamos que hagan eso para lo cual fueron creados,

translation.en: or we end them.
Decisions, decisions.
When we were five, they asked us what we wanted to be when we grew up.
translation.es: De pequeños, nos preguntaron  qué queríamos ser cuando creciéramos.

translation.en: Our answers were things like astronaut, president,
or, in my case, a princess.
When we were ten, they asked again.
We answered rock star, cowboy
or, in my case, a gold medalist.
translation.es: O, en mi caso,  ganadora de una medalla de oro.

translation.en: But now that we've grown up, they want a serious answer.
translation.es: Pero ahora que somos adultos,  quieren una respuesta seria.

translation.en: Well, how about this?
Who the hell knows?
Yeah!
This isn't the time to make hard- and- fast decisions.
translation.es: No es el momento  de tomar decisiones difíciles.

translation.en: This is the time to make mistakes.
translation.es: Es el momento de cometer errores.

translation.en: Take the wrong train and get stuck somewhere.
translation.es: De tomar el tren equivocado y perdernos.

translation.en: Fall in love a lot.
Major in philosophy, because there's no way to make a career out of that.
translation.es: De estudiar filosofía, porque jamás  nos ganaremos la vida con eso.

translation.en: Change your mind, and change it again, because nothing's permanent.
translation.es: De cambiar de opinión una y otra vez,  porque nada es permanente.

translation.en: So make as many mistakes as you can.
translation.es: Así que cometan  cuantos más errores puedan.

translation.en: That way, someday, when they ask what we want to be,
translation.es: Así, algún día,  cuando les pregunten qué quieren ser,

translation.en: we won't have to guess.
We'll know.
You made it!
Hey. What did you think of my speech?
Too easy- breezy? Too self- helpful? You hated it?
No. I think you pretty much nailed it. Yeah?
It's like I was born to lead, right?
I love this song! Let's go.
What are you doing here?
You invited me, remember?
Was my right hook too subtle for you? That was me uninviting you.
translation.es: ¿Mi derechazo fue demasiado sutil? Con eso te desinvité.

translation.en: Look, Bella, I'm sorry about, you know,
the kiss and your hand.
I'd blame it on the whole inner animal thing, but it was really just me
translation.es: Le echaría la culpa a mi lado animal, pero simplemente me comporté

translation.en: being an ass.
I'm really sorry.
I brought you something.
A graduation present. I made it myself.
translation.es: Un regalo de graduación. Yo mismo lo hice.

translation.en: Wow.
You made this?
It's really pretty.
Thanks.
I'll be right back.
Alice, what'd you see? The decision's been made.
translation.es: -¿Qué viste, Alice? -La decisión ha sido tomada.

translation.en: What's going on?
You're not going to Seattle. No.
They're coming here.
They'll be here in four days.
This could turn into a bloodbath.
Who's behind it?
I didn't see anyone I recognized.
Maybe one.
I know his face. He's local. Riley Biers.
translation.es: Reconozco su cara. Es local. Riley Biers.

translation.en: He didn't start this.
Whoever did is staying out of the action.
They must be playing with the blind spots in your vision.
translation.es: Quiere evitar que tú lo veas.

translation.en: Either way, the army is coming
and there aren't enough of us to protect the town.
Hold up. What damn army?
Newborns. Our kind.
What are they after?
They were passing around Bella's scent.
translation.es: Estaban pasándose el aroma de Bella.

translation.en: A red blouse.
They're after Bella? What the hell does this mean?
It means an ugly fight. With lives lost.
translation.es: Significa un combate feroz. Con muchas vidas perdidas.

translation.en: All right. We're in.
No. You'd get yourselves killed. No way.
I wasn't asking for permission.
Edward?
It means more protection for you.
Jacob, do you believe Sam would agree to an understanding?
translation.es: ¿Crees que Sam accedería a un acuerdo, Jacob?

translation.en: As long as we get to kill some vampires.
translation.es: Siempre y cuando podamos matar vampiros.

translation.en: Jasper?
They'll give us the numbers.
Newborns won't know they even exist. That'll give us an edge.
translation.es: Y los recién nacidos no sabrán de su existencia.

translation.en: We'll need to coordinate.
Carlisle, they're gonna get hurt. We'll all need some training.
Fighting newborns requires knowledge that Jasper has.
translation.es: Jasper tiene el conocimiento necesario para combatirlos.

translation.en: You're welcome to join us.
All right. Name the time and place.
translation.es: Bien. Dime el lugar y la hora.

translation.en: Jake, you don't know what you're getting yourself into.
translation.es: No sabes en lo que te estás metiendo.

translation.en: Bella,
this is what we do.
You should be happy.
Look at us, working together.
You are the one who wanted us to get along. Remember?
translation.es: Eras tú quien quería que nos lleváramos bien, ¿recuerdas?

translation.en: Again!
It's a graduation present.
They don't trust us enough to be in their human forms.
translation.es: No nos tienen suficiente confianza como para asumir forma humana.

translation.en: They came. That's what matters.
Will you translate?
Hey, Jake.
Welcome.
Jasper has experience with newborns. He'll teach us how to defeat them.
translation.es: Jasper tiene experiencia con los recién nacidos. Nos enseñará cómo derrotarlos.

translation.en: They want to know how the newborns differ from us.
translation.es: Quieren saber qué los diferencia de nosotros.

translation.en: They're a great deal stronger than us
because their own human blood lingers in their tissues.
translation.es: porque la sangre humana aún permanece en su tejido.

translation.en: Our kind is never more physically powerful
translation.es: Nuestra especie nunca es tan poderosa

translation.en: than in our first several months of this life.
translation.es: como en sus primeros meses de existencia.

translation.en: Carlisle's right. That's why they are created.
translation.es: Carlisle tiene razón. Por eso los crearon.

translation.en: A newborn army doesn't need thousands like a human army,
translation.es: Los recién nacidos no necesitan miles, como un ejército humano.

translation.en: but no human army could stand against them.
translation.es: Ningún ejército humano sería capaz de contenerlos.

translation.en: Now, the two most important things to remember are, first,
translation.es: Lo más importante que debemos recordar es, primero,

translation.en: never let them get their arms around you. They'll crush you instantly.
translation.es: jamás dejen que los abracen. Los harán pedazos.

translation.en: And second,
never go for the obvious kill.
translation.es: nunca opten por el ataque obvio.

translation.en: They'll be expecting that,
and you will lose.
Emmett.
Don't hold back. Not in my nature.
translation.es: -No te contengas. -No es mi forma de ser.

translation.en: Never lose focus.
One more thing.
Never turn your back on your enemy.
translation.es: Jamás le des la espalda a tu enemigo.

translation.en: Some of you are gonna get hurt.
Some of you could get killed because of me.
translation.es: Algunos acabarán muertos por mi culpa.

translation.en: It's gonna be 100 times worse than this, right?
Done for the day.
Jasper?
Are you sure there's nothing I can do to help?
translation.es: ¿Estás seguro de que no puedo ayudar en algo?

translation.en: Well, your presence alone, your scent, will distract the newborns.
translation.es: Tu presencia, tu aroma, distraerá a los recién nacidos.

translation.en: Their hunting instinct will take over and drive them crazy.
translation.es: Su instinto de cazador se apoderará de ellos y los confundirá.

translation.en: Good. I'm glad.
Hey. How do you know so much about this?
I didn't have quite the same upbringing as my adopted siblings.
translation.es: No tuve las mismas experiencias que mis hermanos adoptivos.

translation.en: Those bites are like mine. Battle scars.
All the training the Confederate Army gave me
translation.es: El entrenamiento que me dio el ejército Confederado

translation.en: was useless against the newborns.
translation.es: de nada sirvió contra los recién nacidos.

translation.en: Still, I never lost a fight.
translation.es: Aun así, jamás perdí una batalla.

translation.en: This happened during the Civil War?
I was the youngest major in the Texas cavalry,
translation.es: Era el comandante más joven de la caballería Tejana.

translation.en: all without having seen any real battle.
translation.es: Sin jamás haber participado de una sola batalla.

translation.en: Until?
Till I met a certain immortal.
Maria.
I was riding back to Galveston
after evacuating a column of women and children
translation.es: luego de evacuar  una columna de mujeres y niños.

translation.en: when I saw them.
I immediately offered them my aid.
Lovely. And an officer.
You'd better do it, Maria. I can never stop once I've started.
translation.es: Mejor que lo hagas tú. Nunca puedo contenerme una vez que comienzo.

translation.en: What's your name, soldier? Major Jasper Whitlock, ma'am.
translation.es: -¿Cómo te llamas, soldado? -Comandante Jasper Whitlock, señora.

translation.en: I hope you survive.
You may be of great use to me.
Maria was creating an army? They were very common in the South.
translation.es: -¿María estaba creando un ejército? -Eran muy comunes en el Sur.

translation.en: There were constant brutal battles for territory.
translation.es: Constantemente batallaban por control del territorio.

translation.en: Maria won them all.
She was smart, careful, and she had me.
translation.es: Era inteligente, cautelosa, y me tenía a mí.

translation.en: I was her second in command.
My ability to control emotions served her well.
translation.es: Mi habilidad de controlar emociones  le era muy útil.

translation.en: I trained her newborns.
An endless occupation since she never let them live beyond their first year.
translation.es: Un trabajo sin fin dado  que los mataba al cumplir el año.

translation.en: It was my job to dispose of them.
translation.es: Mi trabajo era deshacerme de ellos.

translation.en: I could feel everything they felt.
translation.es: Yo sentía todo lo que ellos sentían.

translation.en: I thought what Maria and I had was love.
translation.es: Creí que lo nuestro era amor.

translation.en: But I was her puppet. She pulled the strings.
translation.es: Pero sólo era su títere. Ella jalaba de mis hilos.

translation.en: I didn't know there was another way
translation.es: No sabía que existía otra vida.

translation.en: till I found Alice.
Now, she'd seen me coming, of course.
translation.es: Ella me vio venir, por supuesto.

translation.en: You kept me waiting long enough.
My apologies, ma'am.
I don't know what I'd have become without her.
translation.es: No sé qué hubiese sido sin ella.

translation.en: You never have to be that again.
translation.es: Jamás tendrás que volver a ser como antes.

translation.en: Jasper.
I want you to do something for me.
translation.es: Quiero que hagas algo por mí.

translation.en: Kill her.
What is it?
The intruder,
the newborn army,
they're all her puppets.
Victoria.
Alice would have seen if she wanted to make an army.
translation.es: Alice lo hubiese visto, si ella quisiera formar un ejército.

translation.en: Unless she's hiding behind them and she's letting someone else decide.
translation.es: Salvo que se esté escondiendo detrás de ellos y esté dejando que otro decida.

translation.en: Welcome to the army.
I'm not just gonna hide while you're out taking all the risks for me.
translation.es: No me esconderé mientras tú tomas todos los riesgos.

translation.en: If it's Victoria involved, I need to keep you as far away from the fight as possible.
translation.es: Necesito mantenerte lo más apartada posible de la batalla.

translation.en: Jasper said that I could be of help. We won't need your help.
translation.es: -Jasper me dijo que podía ayudar. -No será necesario.

translation.en: With the wolves in this, it's an easy win.
translation.es: Con la ayuda de los lobos, ganaremos fácilmente.

translation.en: The rest of us aren't gonna have enough to do.
Okay. Either it's so dangerous that I have to hide
translation.es: O es tan peligroso que tengo que esconderme

translation.en: or it's so easy that you're gonna be sidelined. Which is it?
translation.es: o tan fácil que ni siquiera participarás. ¿Cuál es?

translation.en: It's dangerous for you, it's easy for us.
translation.es: Es peligroso para ti, fácil para nosotros.

translation.en: I think it's dangerous for us to be apart.
translation.es: Creo que es peligroso que estemos separados.

translation.en: How many times do we have to prove that?
I'll be worried. You'll be worried.
translation.es: Yo estaré preocupada. Tú estarás preocupado.

translation.en: And we'll both be more vulnerable.
Okay, you're right.
So I'm coming with you. No, we both stay away together.
I can't make you choose between me and your family.
translation.es: No puedo pedirte que escojas entre yo y tu familia.

translation.en: The only way I can protect you is to be with you.
translation.es: Sólo puedo protegerte si estoy contigo.

translation.en: You're not fighting? What, did you pull a muscle or something?
He's doing it for me, okay? Whatever.
Just tell me the plan.
This field will give us an advantage in battle.
translation.es: Este campo nos dará una ventaja durante la batalla.

translation.en: We need to lure the newborns with Bella's scent,
translation.es: Necesitamos atraer a los recién nacidos con el aroma de Bella.

translation.en: but it needs to end here.
Edward and I are going to a campsite.
Even if he carries me, they'll still pick up on our scents.
translation.es: Pero si él me lleva, percibirán nuestro aroma.

translation.en: Your stench, however, is revolting.
translation.es: Tu hediondez, sin embargo, es repugnante.

translation.en: Dude, you really don't wanna start comparing stinks.
translation.es: No quieres comparar olores conmigo, viejo.

translation.en: What he means is that your scent will mask mine if you carry me.
translation.es: Quiere decir que tu aroma ocultará el mío si me llevas.

translation.en: Done. This is not a good idea.
Edward, they won't want to get anywhere near his odor.
translation.es: Edward, no querrán ni acercase a su aroma.

translation.en: Okay. Let's just try it.
Eau de wolf coming up. Run.
So you gonna ask me to sit out of the fight, too?
translation.es: ¿También vas a pedirme que no participe de la batalla?

translation.en: Or don't you care about my safety?
Of course, I care. But you'd say no. So I won't have a choice, anyways.
translation.es: -Claro que me preocupa, pero dirías que no. -No tendré alternativa.

translation.en: Since I let Sam be alpha male, I gotta live with the shots he calls.
translation.es: Desde que dejé a Sam al mando, tengo que vivir con sus decisiones.

translation.en: Since you let Sam be alpha?
I didn't wanna be in a pack, let alone be its leader.
translation.es: No quería estar con la manada. Menos aún ser su líder.

translation.en: Wow.
Chief Jacob. Opted out.
But every choice has its consequences.
translation.es: Pero toda decisión tiene sus consecuencias.

translation.en: Some more than others. Don't start.
Everybody makes choices. You're gonna have to accept mine.
translation.es: Todos tomamos decisiones. Deberás aceptar las mías.

translation.en: But you can love more than one person at a time.
translation.es: Pero puedes amar a más de una persona a la vez.

translation.en: I've seen it. With Sam, Emily and Leah.
translation.es: Lo he visto. Con Sam, Emily y Leah.

translation.en: Well, I'm not a wolf. I can't imprint. It has nothing to do with imprinting.
translation.es: -No soy una loba. No puedo imprimir. -No tiene nada que ver con eso.

translation.en: It has to do with feeling something for somebody.
translation.es: Tiene que ver con lo que sientes por alguien.

translation.en: And I know you feel something for me.
translation.es: Y sé que sientes algo por mí.

translation.en: I can sense how I make you feel, physically.
translation.es: Detecto cómo te hago sentir. Físicamente.

translation.en: I make you nervous.
Jake.
Don't worry.
I promised I wouldn't kiss you again till you asked.
translation.es: Prometí no besarte hasta que tú me lo pidieras.

translation.en: You're gonna be keeping that promise for a while, Chief.
translation.es: Tendrás que guardar esa promesa por largo rato, jefe.

translation.en: All I picked up was wolf stench. No Bella.
translation.es: Sólo recogí la fetidez de un lobo. Nada más.

translation.en: This will work. Great.
Yes. Scout's honor.
Okay, Alice, don't be a stranger. Okay.
Your alibi for the battle is all arranged.
translation.es: Tienes una coartada para el día de la batalla.

translation.en: Really?
I told your father that our whole family's going camping this weekend,
translation.es: Le dije a tu padre que mi familia se va de campamento,

translation.en: so you and I are having a sleepover at my house.
translation.es: y que tú y yo vamos a quedarnos en la casa.

translation.en: Charlie's going fishing, anyway. Charlie?
You guys are on first name basis now? Me, he likes.
Actually, you and Edward will have the house to yourself tonight.
translation.es: Tú y Edward tendrán disponible la casa esta noche.

translation.en: Like alone?
We're all going hunting. Powering up for the battle.
translation.es: Nos vamos de cacería. ¿Acumulando energía para la batalla?

translation.en: You're welcome.
Hey. You want a sandwich? No, I'm good.
Well, the sister, I like.
Alice. Yeah, she's great.
Hey, Dad, I was wondering.
Why didn't you get remarried? After Mom.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no te volviste a casar después de mamá?

translation.en: I don't know. Guess I still haven't met the right gal.
translation.es: No sé. Supongo que no conocí a la muchacha adecuada.

translation.en: Why? I don't know.
I thought you just maybe gave up on the whole institution of it,
translation.es: Creí que quizá ya no creías en la institución.

translation.en: of marriage.
But do you think there's any value in it?
Yeah. Yeah, marriage has value.
translation.es: Sí. El matrimonio tiene su valor.

translation.en: When you're older.
Much older.
Like your mother.
It seemed to work out fine for her the second time around,
translation.es: Parece que le dio resultado la segunda vez.

translation.en: later in life. Yeah, I guess.
I mean, you definitely don't wanna have to get married because you weren't...
translation.es: Decididamente no quieres casarte no por no haber tenido

translation.en: careful.
What? Look, you know what I'm talking about.
There's things that you need to think about if you're gonna be physically intimate.
translation.es: Tienes que pensar en ciertas cosas si vas a tener intimidad.

translation.en: Okay. Don't have the talk with me, please.
Well, it's just as embarrassing for me as it is for you.
translation.es: Me da tanta vergüenza como a ti.

translation.en: I doubt that.
And don't bother, 'cause Mom beat you to it like ten years ago.
translation.es: Y no te preocupes, porque mamá te ganó por 10 años.

translation.en: Well, you didn't have a boyfriend ten years ago.
I'm sure things work the same way.
translation.es: Estoy segura de que las cosas no han cambiado.

translation.en: All right, so...
You guys are taking precautions and--
Okay, Dad, please, just don't worry about that.
translation.es: Papá, por favor, no te preocupes por eso.

translation.en: Edward is old school.
Old school. Great. What's that? Like, code for something?
translation.es: Anticuado. Genial. ¿Qué es eso? ¿Un código para algo?

translation.en: Oh, my God. Dad. I'm a virgin.
Ah...  Okay! Good. Glad we covered that.
translation.es: ¡Muy bien! Me alegra que hayamos aclarado eso. Y a mí.

translation.en: Me, too.
Virgin.
I'm liking Edward a little bit more now.
translation.es: Edward me cae un poquito mejor ahora.

translation.en: What are you doing outside? What's wrong?
Nothing.
It seems only fair that I be represented, as well.
translation.es: Me pareció justo que también usaras algo mío.

translation.en: It's really pretty.
Thanks.
There's a bed.
I thought you might need one to sleep in.
translation.es: Pensé que la necesitarías para dormir.

translation.en: I think an air mattress would have sufficed.
translation.es: Un colchón de aire hubiese sido suficiente.

translation.en: Is this too much? No.
No, it's perfect.
I wanna ask you something. Anything.
Okay, marriage is the condition for you to change me yourself, right?
translation.es: El casamiento es tu condición para convertirme, ¿correcto?

translation.en: Yes.
Okay. I wanna negotiate my own condition.
Anything you want. It's yours.
You promise?
Yeah.
Okay.
Hey.
Bella.
No.
But you said that you wanted me to have every human experience.
translation.es: Querías que experimentara lo que todo humano.

translation.en: Not ones that will risk killing you. You won't.
translation.es: -No aquello que puede matarte. -No lo harás.

translation.en: And everyone says once I'm changed all I'm gonna want is to slaughter the whole town.
translation.es: Dicen que cuando me convierta, querré acabar con el pueblo.

translation.en: That part doesn't last forever. I want you.
While I'm still me. While I still want you this way.
translation.es: Como soy ahora. Mientras te sigo deseando de esta manera.

translation.en: It's too dangerous. Try. Just try.
I'll go to some ridiculously expensive college - and let you buy me a car. -
translation.es: Iré a un colegio privado y dejaré que me compres un auto.

translation.en: I'll marry you. Just try.
Stop trying to take your clothes off.
You wanna do that part? Not tonight.
You...
You mean, you don't...
That's fine.
Believe me, I want to.
I just want to be married to you first.
translation.es: Sólo quiero estar casado contigo primero.

translation.en: You really make me feel like I'm some sort of villain
translation.es: Me haces sentir como una villana

translation.en: trying to steal your virtue or something.
It's not my virtue I'm concerned about.
translation.es: No es eso lo que me preocupa.

translation.en: Are you kidding?
It's just one rule I wanna leave unbroken.
translation.es: Es una regla que no quiero quebrantar.

translation.en: It might be too late for my soul, but I will protect yours.
translation.es: Puede que sea demasiado tarde para mi alma, pero protegeré la tuya.

translation.en: I know that's not a modern notion.
translation.es: Sé que no es el pensamiento moderno.

translation.en: It's not modern. It's ancient.
I'm from a different era.
Things were a lot less complicated.
And if I'd have met you back then, I would have courted you.
translation.es: De haberte conocido entonces, te hubiese cortejado.

translation.en: We'd have taken chaperoned strolls and iced tea on the porch.
translation.es: Hubiésemos ido de paseo, acompañados, y compartido un té en el jardín.

translation.en: I may have stolen a kiss or two.
But only after asking your father's permission.
translation.es: Y sólo después de obtener el permiso de tu padre,

translation.en: I would have got down on one knee...
and I would have presented you with a ring.
translation.es: Y te hubiese entregado un anillo.

translation.en: This was my mother's.
Isabella Swan, I promise to love you every moment of forever.
translation.es: Isabella Swan, prometo amarte cada momento para siempre.

translation.en: And would you do me the extraordinary honor of marrying me?
translation.es: ¿Me harías el extraordinario honor de casarte conmigo?

translation.en: Yes.
You're not coming with us?
It'll be a last- minute decision.
translation.es: Será una decisión de último momento.

translation.en: I told you how it works. The Cullens have powers.
translation.es: -Ya te lo expliqué. -Los Cullen tienen poderes.

translation.en: Don't underestimate them, Riley. You'll have the numbers,
translation.es: No los subestimes, Riley. Ustedes serán más.

translation.en: but they'll be able to anticipate your every move.
translation.es: Pero ellos anticiparán cada una de tus acciones.

translation.en: According to your friend? Yes.
My dead friend.
Laurent found out about the things they could do,
translation.es: Laurent descubrió de lo que eran capaces.

translation.en: and they killed him.
But not before he told me.
translation.es: Pero no antes de que me lo dijera.

translation.en: Maybe he was wrong.
I mean, this is supposed to be Cullen territory.
translation.es: Se supone que esto es territorio de los Cullen.

translation.en: We've been tearing it up and I've never even seen them here.
translation.es: Hemos hecho de todo y jamás los hemos visto.

translation.en: You don't trust me.
With my life. I'm just saying-- I'm doing this for us.
translation.es: -Con mi vida. Sólo digo... -Lo hago por nosotros.

translation.en: So that we can feed without their retaliation.
translation.es: Para que podamos alimentarnos sin represalias.

translation.en: I can't live in fear anymore, waiting for them to attack.
translation.es: Ya no puedo vivir esperando a que nos ataquen.

translation.en: I won't let them.
I am going to end the Cullen clan.
I swear.
I love you so much.
You're going overboard.
If this is all I can contribute, I wanna be thorough.
translation.es: Si sólo esto puedo contribuir, quiero ser cuidadosa.

translation.en: The newborns'll be frantic.
It's okay. Don't make yourself uncomfortable.
translation.es: Está bien. No quiero que te sientas incómodo.

translation.en: It doesn't bother me anymore.
Since when?
Since I spent 24 hours thinking you were dead.
translation.es: Desde que pasé 24 horas creyendo que estabas muerta.

translation.en: You're not wearing your ring.
Well, I didn't want to risk losing it.
Or risk Jacob seeing it.
I think we should wait to tell him. I mean, at least till after the fight.
translation.es: Creo que deberíamos esperar hasta después de la batalla.

translation.en: If you're having second thoughts-- I'm not.
I just want him to have a clear head. Whose head is unclear?
translation.es: -Sólo quiero que tenga la mente despejada. -¿Quién está confundido?

translation.en: Nobody's I hope.
Alice says there's a storm coming. Yeah, I can feel it.
translation.es: -Alice dice que se aproxima una tormenta. -Sí, la siento.

translation.en: We should get going.
I'll see you in a couple of hours.
Something up?
Bunch of vampires trying to kill me. Same old, same old.
translation.es: -Unos vampiros quieren matarme. -Lo mismo de siempre.

translation.en: Thank you.
You should get back before the storm hits. No, I'm staying.
translation.es: -Regresa antes de que caiga la tormenta. -Me quedo.

translation.en: You'll need my connection to the pack to keep tabs on what's going on.
translation.es: Mi conexión con la manada nos dirá qué está ocurriendo.

translation.en: You're not gonna fight? Seth will spell me in the morning.
translation.es: -¿No pelearás? -Seth me reemplazará en la mañana.

translation.en: He's not happy about missing the action, but it'll keep him out of trouble.
translation.es: Le disgusta perderse la acción, pero así no se meterá en problemas.

translation.en: Let's get you inside.
I should have chosen a site lower down. No, it's fine. I'm okay.
translation.es: -Debí escoger un lugar a menor elevación. -No, esto está bien. Estoy bien.

translation.en: What can I do?
I can't sleep with all that teeth chattering going on.
translation.es: Tanto castañeteo de dientes no me deja dormir.

translation.en: Forget it.
She may need her toes someday.
translation.es: Puede que algún día necesite los dedos del pie.

translation.en: And let's face it, I am hotter than you.
translation.es: Seamos honestos. Soy más cálido que tú.

translation.en: Get your hand off me. Keep your hands off her.
Don't fight.
If she gets sick, it's on you.
translation.es: Si se enferma, es culpa tuya.

translation.en: Wow, you're freezing, Bella.
Relax. You'll warm up soon.
Faster if you took your clothes off.
translation.es: Más rápido aún si te desvistieras.

translation.en: Jake. Survival 101.
Can you at least attempt to control your thoughts?
translation.es: ¿Al menos puedes intentar controlar tus pensamientos?

translation.en: I really get under that ice- cold skin of yours, don't I?
What?
Are you doubting her feelings for you?
Nice.
So picking through my brain's okay, but letting me into yours, forget it.
translation.es: Así que leer mis pensamientos está bien. Pero ¿dejar que lea los tuyos? Olvídalo.

translation.en: Look.
I know she's in love with you. Oh, good.
translation.es: -Sé que está enamorada de ti. -Qué bien.

translation.en: But she's in love with me, too.
translation.es: Pero también está enamorada de mí.

translation.en: She just won't admit it to herself.
I can't tell if you're right.
translation.es: No puedo decirte si tienes razón.

translation.en: Then let me ask you something.
If she chooses me... She won't.
If she did,
would you try to kill me?
That's an intriguing idea.
But, no. I couldn't hurt her like that.
translation.es: Pero no. No podría hacerle eso.

translation.en: So you'd just turn her into a blood- sucking demon like you?
translation.es: ¿Por eso vas a convertirla en un monstruo chupa sangre como tú?

translation.en: I don't want that. I never wanted that.
translation.es: No quiero eso. Jamás lo quise.

translation.en: So stop her. I tried.
I left. But you gave up too quickly.
If you'd stayed away another six months, I could've made her happy.
translation.es: Si te hubieses alejado por otros seis meses, podría haberla hecho feliz.

translation.en: Trust me.
You have to consider that I might be better for her than you are.
translation.es: Debes considerar que puede que yo sea mejor para ella que tú.

translation.en: I have considered that.
I know you can protect her.
But you can give her a life, a human life. That's all I want for her.
translation.es: Y puedes darle una vida. Una vida humana. Sólo eso deseo para ella.

translation.en: But I'm not...
I'm not going to force her into anything ever again.
translation.es: Jamás volveré a forzarla a hacer algo. Jamás.

translation.en: The last time I tried, it almost killed us both.
translation.es: La última vez que lo intenté, casi morimos los dos.

translation.en: Yeah. That I remember.
When you thought she was gone,
translation.es: Cuando creíste que se había ido,

translation.en: that you'd lost her,
how did you cope?
There are no words.
But I wouldn't wish it on anyone, Jacob.
translation.es: Pero no se lo desearía a nadie.

translation.en: This might sound odd, but I'm glad you're here.
translation.es: Te sonará extraño, pero me alegra que estés aquí.

translation.en: Meaning,
As much as I'd love to kill you, I'm glad she's warm.
translation.es: Me encantaría matarte, pero me alegra que entró en calor.

translation.en: If we weren't natural enemies
and you weren't trying to steal my reason for existing,
translation.es: y estuvieses intentando robarte mi razón de vivir,

translation.en: I might actually like you.
Well,
if you weren't planning on sucking the life out of the girl I love,
translation.es: si no planearas quitarle la vida a la muchacha que amo,

translation.en: I might...
No. Not even then.
But she could still change her mind, you know.
translation.es: Pero aún puede cambiar de idea.

translation.en: Then I'd let her go.
Right. Hey, Seth.
Where's Jacob? Did he already-- Not yet.
He's checking to see if the woods are clear before he goes.
translation.es: Está asegurándose de que no haya nadie en el bosque.

translation.en: I'm really sorry about last night. That couldn't have been easy on you.
translation.es: Lamento lo de anoche. No habrá sido muy agradable.

translation.en: It definitely won't make my list of top ten favorite evenings.
translation.es: No está en mi lista de mis 10 noches favoritas.

translation.en: You have a list? All ten I spent with you.
Number one is when you said you'd marry me, Mrs. Cullen.
translation.es: La número uno es cuando aceptaste casarte conmigo, Sra. Cullen.

translation.en: This is the 21st century. I at least want to hyphenate my name.
translation.es: Estamos en el siglo XXI. Quiero un apellido doble.

translation.en: You're marrying him? Jake, I...
You knew he was listening! He deserves to know.
- Jake, stop! - Bella, let him...
Don't!
Jake, stop!
Jake, please! I'm done! I'm so done!
What can I do?
You can't do anything. I can, by going out there and killing something.
translation.es: Nada. Pero yo sí. Puedo ir a matar algo.

translation.en: No! You're not thinking clearly! Don't do that!
translation.es: ¡No! ¡No estás pensando con claridad! ¡No lo hagas!

translation.en: Maybe I'll get myself killed and make it simple for you.
translation.es: Quizá logre que me maten. Eso te simplificaría todo.

translation.en: No! Just... Jake, stay.
Why?
Give me one good reason.
Because I don't wanna lose you.
It's not good enough.
Because you're too important.
Still not good enough. Jacob!
Kiss me.
I'm asking you to kiss me.
translation.es: Te estoy pidiendo que me beses.

translation.en: That should have been our first kiss.
translation.es: Ése debió ser nuestro primer beso.

translation.en: I gotta go.
I'll be back.
You saw. No, but...
Jacob's thoughts are pretty loud.
I don't know what happened.
You love him.
I love you more.
I know.
It's starting.
Jacob just got there.
He's good.
Someone's hurt?
She's close. I can hear her thoughts.
Seth, go.
She knew we weren't there, but she caught my scent.
translation.es: Sabía que no estábamos ahí. Detectó mi aroma.

translation.en: She knew you'd be with me.
She found us.
She's not alone.
Riley, listen to me.
Victoria's just using you to distract me.
translation.es: Victoria sólo te está usando para distraerme.

translation.en: She knows I'll kill you.
In fact, she'll be glad she doesn't have to deal with you anymore.
translation.es: Es más, le agrada saber que no tendrá que lidiar contigo.

translation.en: Don't listen, Riley. I told you about their mind tricks.
translation.es: No le creas, Riley. Te dije de sus trucos mentales.

translation.en: I can read her mind. So I know what she thinks of you.
translation.es: Puedo leer sus pensamientos. Sé lo que piensa de ti.

translation.en: He's lying.
She only created you and this army to avenge her true mate, James.
translation.es: Sólo te creó para vengar a su amor verdadero, James.

translation.en: That's the only thing she cares about. Not you.
translation.es: Sólo eso es importante para ella. No tú.

translation.en: There's only you. You know that.
Think about it. You're from Forks.
You know the area.
That's the only reason she chose you.
She doesn't love you.
Riley. Don't let him do this to us.
translation.es: No permitas que nos haga esto.

translation.en: You know I love you.
You're dead.
You won't get another chance like this again.
translation.es: No tendrás otra oportunidad como ésta.

translation.en: You want her.
You want me to feel the pain you felt when I killed James,
translation.es: Quieres que yo sienta el dolor que tú sentiste.

translation.en: when I tore him to pieces,
when I turned him into ash,
when I turned him into nothing.
Victoria!
Victoria!
Victoria!
Something is wrong. Alice needs us to go.
Now.
How long? A few minutes. Maybe ten?
The pack needs to leave.
The Volturi won't honor a truce with the werewolves.
translation.es: Los Volturi no honrarán la tregua.

translation.en: Leah, don't!
Jacob!
Jacob. Hold on. Carlisle's gonna take care of you.
The bones on the right half of his body are shattered.
translation.es: Los huesos del lado derecho están destrozados.

translation.en: Bella. Jake, I'm right here.
Jacob, you idiot, I had it! Leah!
I need to set the bones before his accelerated healing kicks in.
translation.es: Necesito fijar los huesos antes de que comience a sanar.

translation.en: It's already starting.  We need to get him out of here.
We're not gonna win a fight with the Volturi.
We'll take him back to Billy's. I'll be there soon as I can.
translation.es: -Iremos a casa de Billy. -Iré de inmediato.

translation.en: Hang in there, Jake.
It's okay. We got you. We got you.
They're coming.
Impressive.
I've never seen a coven escape an assault of this magnitude intact.
translation.es: Jamás vi a un clan escapar intacto de tremenda batalla.

translation.en: We were lucky.
I doubt that.
It appears we missed an entertaining fight.  Yes.
It's not often we're rendered unnecessary.
translation.es: No es muy a menudo que no somos imprescindibles.

translation.en: If you'd arrived a half hour ago, you would have fulfilled your purpose.
translation.es: De haber llegado hace una hora, hubiesen cumplido su propósito.

translation.en: Pity.
You missed one.
We offered her asylum in exchange for her surrender.
translation.es: Le ofrecimos asilo a cambio de su rendición.

translation.en: That wasn't yours to offer.
Why did you come?
Who created you?
You don't need to do that. She'll tell you anything you want to know.
translation.es: No necesitas hacer eso. Te dirá lo que quieres.

translation.en: I know.
I don't know! Riley wouldn't tell us.
translation.es: ¡No lo sé! Riley se rehusó a decirnos.

translation.en: He said our thoughts weren't safe.
translation.es: Dijo que nuestros pensamientos eran peligrosos.

translation.en: Her name was Victoria. Perhaps you knew her.
translation.es: Su nombre era Victoria. Quizá la conocías.

translation.en: Edward, if the Volturi had knowledge of Victoria, they would have stopped her.
translation.es: De haberla conocido, ellos la hubiesen detenido.

translation.en: Isn't that right, Jane?
Of course.
Felix.
She didn't know what she was doing.
We'll take responsibility for her.
Give her a chance.
The Volturi don't give second chances. Keep that in mind.
translation.es: Los Volturi no dan una segunda oportunidad. No lo olviden.

translation.en: Caius will be interested to know that she's still human.
translation.es: A Caius le interesará saber que aún es humana.

translation.en: The date is set.
Take care of that, Felix. I'd like to go home.
translation.es: Encárgate de eso, Felix. Quiero regresar a casa.

translation.en: - Hey. -
It's been going on for a while.  Doc's rebreaking his bones.
translation.es: -Ya va para rato. -El doctor quebrándole los huesos.

translation.en: Why did he have to butt in? I could've taken that tick.
Oh, give it a rest, Leah.
The worst is over. He'll be all right.
translation.es: Lo peor ya pasó. Se recuperará.

translation.en: I gave him some morphine,
but his body temperature will burn it off soon.
translation.es: disipará la morfina que le di.

translation.en: I'll come back to set up a drip.
Thank you.
He's asking for you.
Hey, Jake.
Hey.
I was worried about you. You were worried about me?
Yeah.
I guessed Edward would read my thoughts.
translation.es: Supuse que Edward leería mis pensamientos.

translation.en: Was he hard on you? He wasn't even mad at me.
translation.es: -¿Fue duro contigo? -Ni siquiera se enojó conmigo.

translation.en: Or you.
Well, damn.
He's better than I thought. He's not playing a game.
translation.es: -Es mejor de lo que pensaba. -No es un juego.

translation.en: Right.
Bella.
He's not as perfect as you think.
translation.es: No es tan perfecto como tú crees.

translation.en: I know who he is.
Can we just not talk about that?
I'd rather get all the rebreaking done at once.
translation.es: Prefiero que me rompan todos los huesos de una vez.

translation.en: Well, at least I know I did everything I could.
translation.es: Al menos sé que hice todo lo que pude.

translation.en: It wasn't easy making you admit your feelings for me.
translation.es: No fue fácil obligarte a admitir lo que sentías por mí.

translation.en: I only fought them because I knew they wouldn't change anything.
translation.es: Sólo los combatí porque sabía que nada cambiarían.

translation.en: I'm exactly right for you, Bella.
translation.es: Soy la persona perfecta para ti, Bella.

translation.en: It would be as easy as breathing, with me.
translation.es: Conmigo sería tan fácil como el respirar.

translation.en: You know I love you.
You know how much I wish it was enough.
translation.es: Sabes cómo desearía que eso fuera suficiente.

translation.en: Should I come back?
I need some time.
But I'll always be waiting.
Until my heart stops beating.
translation.es: Hasta que mi corazón deje de latir.

translation.en: Maybe even then.
August 13th? Yeah. It's a month before my birthday.
translation.es: -¿Agosto 13? -Sí. Un mes antes de mi cumpleaños.

translation.en: I don't need to be another year older than you.
translation.es: No necesito cumplir un año más.

translation.en: Alice said she could get the wedding together by then.
translation.es: Alice dijo que organizará la boda.

translation.en: I'm sure she can.
There's no rush.
I've chosen my life. I want to start living it.
translation.es: Escogí mi vida. Quiero comenzar a vivirla.

translation.en: And so you're gonna let Alice plan the whole thing?
translation.es: ¿Así que dejarás que Alice planee todo?

translation.en: The, uh, dress, the reception, the guest list.
translation.es: El vestido, la recepción, los invitados.

translation.en: I mean, who knows who she's gonna invite?
Does it matter?
I just don't know why you're doing this.
translation.es: Sólo dime por qué lo estás haciendo.

translation.en: What? The wedding? No.
You're trying to make everyone else happy,
translation.es: Quieres hacer felices a todos los demás.

translation.en: but you're already giving away too much.
You're wrong.
This wasn't a choice between you and Jacob.
translation.es: No tuve que escoger entre tú y Jacob.

translation.en: It was between who I should be and who I am.
translation.es: Escogí entre quien debo ser y quien soy.

translation.en: I've always felt out of step, like literally stumbling through my life.
translation.es: Siempre me sentí fuera de lugar. Como que trastabillaba por la vida.

translation.en: I've never felt normal.
Because I'm not normal.
I don't want to be.
I've had to face death and loss and pain
translation.es: He confrontado a la muerte, la pérdida y el dolor

translation.en: in your world, but I've also never felt stronger
translation.es: en tu mundo. Pero nunca me sentí tan fuerte.

translation.en: and more real, more myself.
Because it's my world, too.
It's where I belong.
So it's not just about me?
No. Sorry.
I've made a mess trying to figure all this out,
translation.es: He complicado todo en mi intento por comprenderlo,

translation.en: but I wanna do it right.
And I wanna tie myself to you in every way humanly possible.
translation.es: Y quiero unirme a ti de toda manera humanamente posible.

translation.en: Starting with a wedding.
Actually,
something a little more difficult first. And maybe even dangerous.
translation.es: debemos comenzar con algo mucho más complicado. Y quizá más peligroso.

translation.en: We have to tell Charlie.
It's highly dangerous.
It's a good thing you're bulletproof.
translation.es: Por suerte eres a prueba de balas.

translation.en: I'm gonna need that ring.
And you're all mine
